description:
Could there be anything better than a headlamp that adjusts light output to the situation? We don't think so. Its integrated sensor analyzes and responds to reflected light. So when you start reading a map, the beam becomes soft and diffused. When you're moving, it uses a wide, mid-bright setting to show immediate obstacles. When you glance ahead, it brightens and narrows to let you pick out details.

  • Equipped with both REACTIVE LIGHTING® (up to 1500 lumens) and standard (high: 900 lumens, medium: 250 lumens and low: 10 lumens) lighting modes
  • REACTIVE LIGHTING® customizes your headlamp’s output to best match your current conditions, from how bright the light is, to what type of beam it uses
  • USB recharging makes it easy to charge your light on laptops, solar panels or battery banks
  • 5-level battery status indicator lets you know how your battery is doing, both when charging or in use
  • IPX4 weather protection keeps your light shining in pouring rain
  • Stabilizing headband cradles the base of your head, improving comfort and beam stability
  • Quick and easy rear adjustment
  • Lock function keeps the light from turning on while in transit
  • 10 lumen reserve mode runs for 2 hours, ensuring you don’t get left in the dark
  • Red lighting, continuous or strobe lighting at the back of the headlamp to help keep you visible
  • Helmet strap and storage pouch included
name: Petzl Nao RL Headlamp
